data.message: I love reading people's comments I just can't help myself. It's like an addiction. So in honor of those comments that I have read, I have decided to write my own comment. And it's all for you. I hope you enjoy reading my comment as much as I have enjoyed writing it. It's not an interesting comment, but I'm pretty certain you have read the comment up to this point, so you may as well just keep reading right down to the end. And also thank me for wasting your time cause this is very useless

replies.message: Actually your comment wasn't wasting my time no more than the other negative comments are, your comment at least wasn't negative and is formally structured I would rather read your comment all day then read these hateful comments people put out😊👌💯
Jajajajaja chinga tu madre. Incluso use traductor.
This actually was very interesting and helpful. The "meh" attitude is needed sometimes.
same as me bruh I enjoy reading those trash comments

Yes, but if we don’t comment about reading your comment then you will never know that we read your comment and your efforts will be in vain! Ha ha, you have to get up pretty early in the morning to pull one over on this clever Sicilian... wait...... aah shit......
